Sports Contest for Paektusan Cup Opens 
   Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The 12th Sports Contest for Paektusan Cup of officials of national institutions opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street here on Tuesday.
 Competitions will be taking place in eight events including table-tennis, volleyball, tennis, Taekwon-Do and defence sports at the Kim Il Sung Stadium and gymnasiums in Chongchun Street.    
 Among those present at the ceremony was Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
